de.unisiegen.tpml.core
Interface ProofRule

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<ProofRule>
All Known Subinterfaces:
BigStepProofRule, SmallStepProofRule, TypeCheckerProofRule
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBigStepProofRule, AbstractProofRule, AbstractTypeCheckerProofRule, DefaultSmallStepProofRule
public interface ProofRule
extends Comparable<ProofRule>

Base interface for proof rules in the small and big step interpreters and the type checker.

Version:
$Rev: 377 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
ProofRuleSet

Method Summary
 int getGroup()
          Returns the group to which this proof rule belongs.
 String getName()
          Returns the user visible name of the proof rule, without the parenthesis.
 
Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable
compareTo
 

Method Detail

getGroup

int getGroup()
Returns the group to which this proof rule belongs. The group is an identifier used to sort the rules when displaying them to the user. The user interface should simply sort the rules by group and name, adding a separator between the different groups.

Returns:
the group id for this proof rule.

getName

String getName()
Returns the user visible name of the proof rule, without the parenthesis. For example for the big step proof rule (APP) the name is just "APP".

Returns:
the user visible rule name of the proof rule.
